## Project Name - Domscrolling-for-coder
> what it is - A web application that provides a seamless scrolling experience for coders, by removing the useless brainrot so instead of scrolling on instagram or youtube, you can scroll on this platform where it automatically curates coding content for you for the platform like instagram or youtube so the gold that is lost in the sea of content can be found and consumed by coders to better their skills and knowledge.

---

### Technologies Used
- Frontend: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI, Axios
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js
- Database: MongoDB
- Authentication: Clerk
- Package Management: Bun

---

### what's Github Copilot's role?

1. important this file is only for making changes in the Frontend part of the project so do not make any changes to the Backend or other parts of the project.
2. make sure to follow the existing code style and conventions used in the project.
3. make sure to don't create unessary components or files unless asked specifically.
4. Don't install unssesary packages or dependencies.
5. Don't Create any unnecessary Docs or README files.
7. make sure the Ui looks proffessional and clean.
8. mostly using UI components are from shadcn ui library and 21st.dev
9. mostly development server is running in the background no need to kill it , or start it again unless asked specifically .

---

### Pages in the Frontend

1. Landing Page - A welcoming page that introduces users to the platform and its features.
2. Login/Register Page - A page where users can create an account or log in to access the platform.
3. Home Page -  the main page appear after login where the feed the reels topic , channel, etc will be shown.
4. Reels Page - A dedicated page for users to scroll through curated coding reels.
> for now these are the essestial pages we need to focus on.
